page.title: 17Clubs
page.content: {Art Club The Art Club meets fortnightly during the Summer months in the Village Hall culminating in an exhibition at the end of August.The class is taken by Mrs. Molyneux who lives in the village, and sometimes they have a visiting lecturer for a week-end. {Women's Institute A Women's Institute has been meeting monthly on the first Wednesday of the month for almost 60 years The meeting consists of a talk by a visiting speaker, a competition and a 'pooled' supper.Membership is in the mid thirties.Evening classes are held in the Winter months. {Village Hall Activities such as Whist Drives,Dances and Concerts using local talent are held to help raise funds to support the Village Hall.
